TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Peer extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public MustInherit Class Peer Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of Peer), ISerializable
public ref class Peer abstract : IDisposable, IEquatable<System::Net::PeerToPeer::Collaboration::Peer ^>, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type Peer = class interface IDisposable interface IEquatable<Peer> interface ISerializable

summary.span: 此类表示远程对等方。

span.span: This class represents a remote peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象的目的类是提供可由共享通用基类定义派生类，如和。The purpose of the abstract class is to provide a common base class definition that can be shared by derived classes such as and . 它不能直接构造，因为它是抽象的。It cannot be directly constructed, since it is abstract. 开发人员应改用子类子类。Developers should use the subclasses PeerNearMe or PeerContact instead. 联系人、 对等方、 远程对等， ，和都是同义词，根据上下文。Contact, peer, remote peer, , , and are synonymous terms, based on context. "调用对等方"和"远程对等方"是通常同义的。"Calling peer" and "remote peer" are commonly synonymous. 调用对等方不引用调用给定的方法的应用程序。Calling peer does not refer to the application calling a given method.

span.span: Handling and Raising Events

related.span: Windows 解决书籍 API 参考

span.span: Windows Address Book API Reference
Windows Contact Manager

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个对等方被视为相等，如果它们具有相同的终结点集合，而不考虑中的值及其属性。Two peers are considered equal if they have the same endpoint collection, regardless of the values in their properties. 使用方案并不涉及此类直接，但包括派生或类。Usage scenarios do not involve this class directly, but rather the derived or the classes.

summary.span: 从本地缓存中获取由对等方注册的数据对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of data objects that were registered by the peer from a local cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此功能仅公开上类。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 任何其他类型的对等方出于安全原因不会公开此功能。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons. 如果不找到任何对象的终结点，被返回一系列大小为零 (0)If no objects are found for the endpoint, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection GetObjects() cil managed

summary.span: 从本地缓存中获取数据对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of data objects from a local cache.

returns.span: 由此实例指定的对等方或终结点的 集合。

span.span: The collection for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此功能仅公开上类。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 任何其他类型的对等方出于安全原因不会公开此功能。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons. 如果对等方协作会话未与实例化的，此方法不能访问本地计算机上的对象。If the peer collaboration session did not instantiate with a of , this method cannot access objects on the local computer. 这同样适用的应用程序注册到协作会话。The same is true of the applications registered into the collaboration session. 对等对象的集合包含的应用程序、 数据对象和对等方或指定此实例的终结点的状态信息。The collection of peer objects consists of application, data object, and presence information for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance. 如果不找到任何对象的终结点，被返回一系列大小为零 (0)If no objects are found for the endpoint, a collection of size zero (0) is returned. 如果调用对等方订阅了此终结点，缓存会自动更新;否则为必须在调用此方法之前调用。If the calling peer is subscribed to this endpoint, the cache is automatically updated; otherwise must be called prior to calling this method. 调用方不需要登录到协作基础结构才能成功完成此方法。The caller is not required to be signed into the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully. 在成功调用或某个方法必须已完成时调用方之前调用此方法签名。A successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was signed in previous to calling this method. 注意： 上定义其他重载类而不是子类和。NOTE: Additional overloads are defined on the class instead of the subclasses and .

exception.span: 调用方未订阅终结点或尚未调用 。

span.span: The caller is not subscribed to the endpoint or has not yet called .

exception.span: 此方法因基础对等方协作基础结构中的错误而无法完成。

span.span: The method is unable to complete due to an error in the underlying Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此功能仅公开上类。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 任何其他类型的对等方出于安全原因不会公开此功能。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons. 对等对象的集合包含的应用程序、 数据对象和对等方或指定此实例的终结点的状态信息。The collection of peer objects consists of application, data object, and presence information for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance. 如果不找到任何对象的终结点，被返回一系列大小为零 (0)If no objects are found for the endpoint, a collection of size zero (0) is returned. 当调用对等方已订阅此终结点时，缓存会自动更新;否则为必须在调用此方法之前调用。When the calling peer is subscribed to this endpoint, the cache is automatically updated; otherwise must be called prior to calling this method. 调用方不需要登录到协作基础结构才能成功完成此方法。The caller is not required to be signed into the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully. 在成功调用或某个方法必须已完成时调用方之前调用此方法签名。A successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was signed in previous to calling this method. 调用此方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 协作会话开始时，将创建此状态。This state is created when the collaboration session begins. 注意： 上定义其他重载而不是派生类的类和。NOTE: Additional overloads are defined on the class instead of the derived classes and .

summary.span: 取消使用 方法发送的邀请。

span.span: Cancels the invitation that was sent with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可保证系统将停止等待从与 InviteAsync 请求关联的对等方。Calling this method guarantees the system will cease to wait for a from the peer associated with the InviteAsync request. 在任何给定时间，可能尚未完成多个邀请。Multiple invitations may be outstanding at any given time. 如果方法时由标识异步操作调用`userToken`是中是否存在，不引发异常。If the method is called when an asynchronous operation identified by the `userToken` is not in existence, an exception is thrown. `userToken`必须提供对象，因为它用于跟踪特定的异步调用。The `userToken` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call. 此主机应用程序提供的对象是唯一的每个邀请请求。This host application-supplied object is unique for each invite request. 使用此方法时，仍然可以引发事件，但关联的已取消属性对象将被设置为 `true.`When this method is used, the event can still be raised, but the Cancelled property on the associated object will be set to `true.` 调用此方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of .

exception.span: 参数不能为

span.span: The parameter cannot be

exception.span: 异步邀请不是未完成的。

span.span: An asynchronous invitation is not outstanding.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ SynchronizingObject { System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ value); };
member this.SynchronizingObject : System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke with get, set

summary.span: 设置此属性值后，将在创建特定 的线程上为因异步操作而未激发的所有事件回调关联的事件处理程序。

span.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

value.span: 实现 接口的对象，此对象在创建它的线程上供该事件处理程序同步类型的实例使用。

span.span: Object that implements the interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是`null`，它指示系统线程池线程上调用程序所有事件处理程序。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此属性通常设置为 UI 元素如实例。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.

exception.span: 已释放调用对象。

span.span: The calling object has been disposed.
